comments:
1. Started with a fresh Eclipse build.
2. Loaded swt project.
3. Turned off autobuild.
4. In Packages view, created .classpath file.
5. Performed a Build All.
6. Tried to run a use case example.  Got an internal error and the walkback 
below.
7. Turned autobuild on and loaded the swt examples project.
8. Ran an example - it worked.  Repeated Step 6 and it worked.  

Log: Wed Nov 28 15:07:57 EST 2001

I think this is a duplicate moving to CORE

This is not JDT/Core, but the client code not protecting against a spec'ed 
exception.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5835 ***
